Package de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.connector

Class InboundConnectorBase

java.lang.Object
de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.connector.ConnectorBase
de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.connector.InboundConnectorBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConnectorDefinition, Orchestratable<ConnectorOrchestrationInfo>, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
Direct Known Subclasses:
GenericInboundConnectorBase, RestInboundConnectorBase
public abstract class InboundConnectorBase extends ConnectorBase
Base class for Inbound connector definitions

This class provides a default implementation that reads the values provided in the InboundConnector annotation. It's meant to be extended by different types of inbound connectors.

See Also:
  • GenericInboundConnectorBase
  • RestInboundConnectorBase

    • getRequestModelClass

      public final Class<?> getRequestModelClass()
      Description copied from interface: ConnectorDefinition
      Returns the base class of the request model used by the connector. This is the request model that is used by the adapter to communicate with the external system.
      Returns:
      Request model base class

    • getResponseModelClass

      public final Optional<Class<?>> getResponseModelClass()
      Description copied from interface: ConnectorDefinition
      Returns the base class of the response model used by the connector. This is the response model that is used by the adapter to communicate with the external system.
      Returns:
      Response model base class, or an empty Optional if the connector does not have a response flow

    • getPathToDocumentationResource

      public String getPathToDocumentationResource()
      Description copied from interface: ConnectorDefinition
      Returns the path to the documentation resource for this connector. The documentation resource is a file that contains documentation for the connector, such as a description of the external system's API.
      Returns:
      Path to the documentation resource
